summary: Iteration 52 - Mobile overflow fixes, Audio queue functionality, and Voice default fixes verified. Found and FIXED backend voice_model default from 'nova' to 'emma'. All features working as expected.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Mobile overflow (375x667) - Dashboard: body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO OVERFLOW
PASS: Mobile overflow (375x667) - History: body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO OVERFLOW
PASS: Network status indicator (data-testid='network-status') visible in header
PASS: FOR_YOU recommendations section present with PLAY_ALL button (data-testid='play-all-recommendations')
PASS: AudioPlayerBar has DotsSixVertical drag handles for queue reordering
PASS: Queue items have data-testid='queue-item-{idx}' and data-testid='queue-remove-{idx}' attributes
PASS: DashboardLayout motion.div has 'min-w-0 overflow-hidden' to prevent mobile overflow
PASS: Backend voice defaults fixed - new users get voice_model='emma' (YarnGPT) not 'nova' (OpenAI)
PASS: Voice settings endpoint /api/settings/{user_id}/voice defaults to 'emma'
PASS: TTS endpoints (lines 189, 193, 223) default to voice_id='emma'
PASS: yarngpt_service.py is primary TTS provider with OpenAI fallback
FIXED: UserSettings model line 1033 - changed voice_model default from 'nova' to 'emma'

success_rate.frontend: 100% for mobile overflow and queue UI

test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: All mobile overflow issues fixed via min-w-0 overflow-hidden on DashboardLayout motion.div. Voice defaults now use 'emma' (YarnGPT) instead of 'nova' (OpenAI). Queue drag-to-reorder uses HTML5 drag-and-drop with DotsSixVertical handles. Briefings cached in DB may still show old 'nova' voice_id - regenerate to get 'emma'. Tour modal appears on first visit - use SKIP_TOUR button to dismiss.

queue_drag_handles.notes: DotsSixVertical icons present in AudioPlayerBar queue items

voice_defaults_backend.notes: New users get voice_model='emma', fixed UserSettings model

tts_yarngpt_integration.notes: yarngpt_service.py is primary TTS with OpenAI fallback
